The amount of time after which an unused session will expire. Session Timeout Minutes defaults to the value configured in the Password Rules unless set to a non-zero value.

Do_Not_Allow_UI_Sessions.description: If the field is false, the integration system user will be able to sign in from both the UI and through web services.

Session_Timeout_Minutes.description: The amount of time after which an unused session will expire. Session Timeout Minutes defaults to the value configured in the Password Rules unless set to a non-zero value.
